txt.en: Glórellas has asked you to defeat foes in Agarnaith in order to aid adventurers in that plague-ridden reach of Gorgoroth.
Glórellas is in the Court of Celeborn.
Defeated Orcs and Uruks in Agarnaith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Glórellas asked you to defeat beasts and Orc-kind in Agarnaith.

'If there was some way to heal the hurts of Agarnaith, I would ask you to undertake it. Since there is not, and cannot be, I am content for you to do as you have done against the dangers that lurk within its bounds.\n\n'Return tomorrow and I may have more for you to do on behalf of Lothlórien, [placeholder].'

'Of all the lands of Gorgoroth, it is Agarnaith that I find most offensive. That is a land twisted, corrupted by plague and disease, and it saddens my heart to hear of it. The beauty in that place has been gone for thousands of years, but still it pains me to know of its loss.\n\n'The corruption in Agarnaith has had a withering effect upon the beasts that roam that foul swamp-land; they should be given an end, for that would be a mercy. As for the Orcs and Uruks that lurk, it is not mercy I would wish for them, but an ending that will safe-guard the unfortunate wanderers that must walk in that land. See to both of these aims, and return to me for my thanks and a small reward.'

'The corruption in Agarnaith has had a withering effect upon the beasts that roam that foul swamp-land; they should be given an end, for that would be a mercy. As for the Orcs and Uruks that lurk, it is not mercy I would wish for them, but an ending that will safe-guard the unfortunate wanderers that must walk in that land. See to both of these aims, and return to me for my thanks and a small reward.'
Defeat Orcs and Uruks in Agarnaith ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Glórellas in the Court of Celeborn
Daily Request: Swamp Full of Danger
